sentences.en: As it passed the planet Neptune, Voyager turned its cameras back toward the distant Earth.
sentences.cn: 当它越过海王星时, ‘航海家’将镜头转向后面朝着遥远的地球.

sentences.en: By 2020, Voyager 2 will probably fall silent, its generators too feeble to power communications.
sentences.cn: 到了2020年, “旅行者2号”可能沉寂下来, 因为它的供电装置将虚弱到不能为通讯系统提供足够电力.

sentences.en: For a scientist the Voyager mission the stuff that dreams are made of.
sentences.cn: 对于一位科学家来说,“航行者”号太空行动是由梦想构成的一种使命.

sentences.en: Fortunately, Voyager managed to avoid the orbiting junk.
sentences.cn: 幸好, “旅行者”设法避开了轨道上的废物.

sentences.en: From Voyager, we now know a lot more about Uranus.
sentences.cn: 从旅行者2号那里, 我们知道了不少有关天王星的情况.

sentences.en: In the year 296,036 , Voyager 2 will pass within 4.3 lightyears of Sirius.
sentences.cn: 在296036年, “旅行者2号”将在4.3光年的距离范围内通过天狼星.

sentences.en: Info: Proxy Voyager - Keep anonymity the Web.
sentences.cn: 信息: 代理旅行者 - 保持匿名在网络上.

sentences.en: Nous n'allons pas voyager à cause de mauvais temps.
sentences.cn: 111由于天气不好,我们不去旅行了.

sentences.en: Somehow the geriatric Voyager 2, arthritic and partially deaf, managed to reach Neptune.
sentences.cn: 得了关节炎而且局部变聋 、 衰老的“旅行者2号”最后总算抵达海王星.

sentences.en: The sight of the shore Brought immense relief to the weary voyager.
sentences.cn: 看到海岸,对于疲惫的旅客真是有如释重负之感.

sentences.en: This meant Voyager could lift and carry many times its weight in fuel.
sentences.cn: 所以,“旅行者”号具有良好的上升性能,并且,它携带的燃料可比飞机本身的重量多几倍.

sentences.en: Voyager 1 flew by Jupiter in 1979 and reached Saturn in 1980.
sentences.cn: [旅行者1号]于1977年发射,1980年到达土星.

sentences.en: Voyager 2: Low - Energy Charged Particles, Cosmic Ray Subsystem, Magnetometer, Plasma Wave Subsystem and Plasma Subsystem.
sentences.cn: 旅行者2号: 低能带电粒子, 宇宙射线子系统, 磁强计, 等离子体波子系统和等离子子系统.

sentences.en: Voyager Two also found a giant storm south of Neptune's equator.
sentences.cn: 旅行者2号还发现海王星赤道以南有巨大的风暴.

sentences.en: When the heart of this star - crossed voyager.
sentences.cn: 当心脏的这个星越过旅行者.

trans.tran_en: someone who makes long and often dangerous journeys, especially on the sea
